SELECT A.SEQ, A.FIELD_SEQ, A.FIELD_SUB_NM, A.FIELD_RENTAL, A.FIELD_SHOWER, A.FIELD_PARKING, A.FIELD_DRINK, A.FIELD_INFO, A.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REG_DATE, A.MOD_ID, TO_CHAR(A.MOD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') MOD_DATE, A.ORDER_NO, B.FIELD_MAIN_NM FROM ( SELECT SEQ, FIELD_SEQ, FIELD_SUB_NM, FIELD_RENTAL, FIELD_SHOWER, FIELD_PARKING, FIELD_DRINK, FIELD_INFO, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE, ORDER_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM WEB_FIELD_SUB WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WEB_FIELD_MAIN B ON A.FIELD_SEQ = B.SEQ WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
SELECT SEQ, FIELD_SEQ, FIELD_SUB_NM, FIELD_RENTAL, FIELD_SHOWER, FIELD_PARKING, FIELD_DRINK, FIELD_INFO, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE, ORDER_NO, DEL_YN FROM WEB_FIELD_SUB WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
